content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5))
- Boiler is connected to pipes at positions (109.5, -31.5) and (113.5, -31.5)
- Steam engine is connected to pipes at positions (117.5, -33.0) and (117.5, -28.0)
- Offshore pump is connected to pipes at position (107.5, -34.5)

### Copper plate mine at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of furnace (position (62.0, -54.0))
- Furnace has no ingredients to smelt

### Water pipe system at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -33.5), (109.5, -32.5), and (109.5, -31.5)
- Connected to offshore pump at position (107.5, -33.5)

### Steam pipe system at position (117.5, -34.5)
Consists of pipes at positions (117.5, -34.5), (118.5, -34.5), (119.5, -34.5), and others
- Connected to steam engine at position (117.5, -30.5)

### Belt system at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of belts at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when trying to insert coal into boiler: 
  - Make sure you have coal in your inventory before trying to insert it into the boiler
* Errors when boiler is out of fuel: 
  - Make sure to add coal to the boiler regularly to keep it working
* Errors when steam engine is not connected: 
  - Make sure the steam engine is connected to a pipe system and has a fluid input
* Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt: 
  - Make sure to add ingredients to the furnace to smelt them
PACE
* Defi
# NAMESned functions: 
  - insert_item (Prototype, Entity, quantity)
  - harvest (resource)
* Assigned variables: 
  - transport-belt (int)
  - small-electric-pole (int)
  - wood (int)
  - iron-ore (int)
  - copper-ore (int)
  - iron-plate (int)
  - copper-plate (int)
  - copper-cable (int)
  - iron-gear-wheel (int)
